name: Girl's Lovecast (mikamiga) (mikamiga) (mikamiga)
description:
Summary

Girl's Lovecast is an action-adventure RPG in which girls try their best and defeat darkness. It is a story-rich game with a focus on character development and interactions. You explore dungeons and fight demons, and you explore hub areas, talking to NPCs to gather clues and complete sidequests.

Do you like this project? Please consider offering your support by leaving a nice comment or sharing the project with someone else!

Version 0.1.8-alpha
  • This game contains ~2+ hours of content. It has the entirety of the Prologue scenario, and a preview of the main story that ends when the player tries going to school.
  • Content is added in the form of major updates. Bug fixes and quality-of-life improvements are included with fairly regular minor updates.
  • The city overworld is a little empty right now, with plans to add more content in a later major update.
Major content update coming soon!
  • 2+ hours of new story content and gameplay
  • New gameplay mechanics and features
  • Multiple quality-of-life upgrades and bug fixes
